verses.verse: It happened after <S%H310><s%> the plague, <S%H4046><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H5375><s%> a census <S%H7218><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> all who are able to go <S%H3318><s%> forth to war <S%H6635><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with them in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take a census, <S%H6242><s%> from twenty years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward; <S%H4605><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>" These are those that came out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben: <S%H7205><s%> of Hanoch, <S%H2585><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hanochites; <S%H2599><s%> of Pallu, <S%H6396><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Palluites; <S%H6384><s%>
of Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hezronites; <S%H2697><s%> of Carmi, <S%H3756><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Carmites. <S%H3757><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Reubenites; <S%H7206><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were forty <S%H705><s%> - three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty. <S%H7970><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pallu: <S%H6396><s%> Eliab. <S%H446><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab: <S%H446><s%> Nemuel, <S%H5241><s%> and Dathan, <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram. <S%H48><s%> These are that Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram, <S%H48><s%> who were called <S%H7148><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> who strove <S%H5327><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the company <S%H5712><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> when they strove <S%H5327><s%> against Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%>

and the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> its mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and swallowed them up <S%H1104><s%> together with Korah, <S%H7141><s%> when that company <S%H5712><s%> died; <S%H4194><s%> what time the fire <S%H784><s%> devoured <S%H398><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and they became a sign. <S%H5251><s%>
Notwithstanding, <S%H1121><s%> the sons of Korah <S%H7141><s%> didn't <S%H4191><s%> die.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Nemuel, <S%H5241><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Nemuelites; <S%H5242><s%> of Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jaminites; <S%H3228><s%> of Jachin, <S%H3199><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jachinites; <S%H3200><s%>
of Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zerahites; <S%H2227><s%> of Shaul, <S%H7586><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shaulites. <S%H7587><s%>
These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Simeonites, <S%H8099><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Zephon, <S%H6827><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zephonites; <S%H6831><s%> of Haggi, <S%H2291><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Haggites; <S%H2291><s%> of Shuni, <S%H7764><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shunites; <S%H7765><s%>
of Ozni, <S%H244><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Oznites; <S%H244><s%> of Eri, <S%H6179><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Erites; <S%H6180><s%>
of Arod, <S%H720><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Arodites; <S%H722><s%> of Areli, <S%H692><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Arelites. <S%H692><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H705><s%> forty thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah: <S%H3063><s%> Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan; <S%H209><s%> and Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%> were: <S%H7956><s%> of Shelah, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shelanites; <S%H8024><s%> of Perez, <S%H6557><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Perezites; <S%H6558><s%> of Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Zerahites. <S%H2227><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> were: <S%H2696><s%> of Hezron, the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hezronites; <S%H2697><s%> of Hamul, <S%H2538><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hamulites. <S%H2539><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H7657><s%> seventy - six thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Tola, <S%H8439><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Tolaites; <S%H8440><s%> of Puvah, <S%H6312><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Punites; <S%H6324><s%>
of Jashub, <S%H3437><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jashubites; <S%H3432><s%> of Shimron, <S%H8110><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shimronites. <S%H8117><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H8346><s%> sixty - four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Sered, <S%H5624><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Seredites; <S%H5625><s%> of Elon, <S%H356><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Elonites; <S%H440><s%> of Jahleel, <S%H3177><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jahleelites. <S%H3178><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Zebulunites <S%H2075><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H8346><s%> sixty thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Machirites; <S%H4354><s%> and Machir <S%H4353><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Gilead; <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gileadites. <S%H1569><s%>

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead: <S%H1568><s%> of Iezer, <S%H372><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Iezerites; <S%H373><s%> of Helek, <S%H2507><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Helekites; <S%H2516><s%>
and Asriel, <S%H844><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Asrielites; <S%H845><s%> and Shechem, <S%H7928><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shechemites; <S%H7930><s%>
and Shemida, <S%H8061><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shemidaites; <S%H8062><s%> and Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hepherites. <S%H2662><s%>

Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher <S%H2660><s%> had no sons, <S%H1121><s%> but daughters: <S%H1323><s%> and the names <S%H8034><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> were Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> and Noah, <S%H5270><s%> Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> and Tirzah. <S%H8656><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were fifty <S%H2572><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Shuthelah, <S%H7803><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuthelahites; <S%H8364><s%> of Becher, <S%H1071><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Becherites; <S%H1076><s%> of Tahan, <S%H8465><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Tahanites. <S%H8470><s%>
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shuthelah: <S%H7803><s%> of Eran, <S%H6197><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Eranites. <S%H6198><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H7970><s%> thirty - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%> These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> after their families. <S%H4940><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Bela, <S%H1106><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Belaites; <S%H1108><s%> of Ashbel, <S%H788><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ashbelites; <S%H789><s%> of Ahiram, <S%H297><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ahiramites; <S%H298><s%>
of Shephupham, <S%H8197><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuphamites; <S%H7781><s%> of Hupham, <S%H2349><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Huphamites. <S%H2350><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%> were Ard <S%H714><s%> and Naaman: <S%H5283><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Ardites; <S%H716><s%> of Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Naamites. <S%H5280><s%>

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> after their families; <S%H4940><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were forty <S%H705><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Shuham, <S%H7748><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuhamites. <S%H7749><s%> These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> after their families. <S%H4940><s%>

All the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Shuhamites, <S%H7749><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H8346><s%> were sixty - four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Imnah, <S%H3232><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Imnites; <S%H3232><s%> of Ishvi, <S%H4940><s%> the family of the Ishvites; <S%H3441><s%> of Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Berites. <S%H1284><s%>

Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah: <S%H1283><s%> of Heber, <S%H2268><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Heberites; <S%H2277><s%> of Malchiel, <S%H4439><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Malchielites. <S%H4440><s%>
The name <S%H8034><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> was Serah. <S%H8294><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H2572><s%> fifty - three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Jahzeel, <S%H3183><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jahzeelites; <S%H3184><s%> of Guni, <S%H1476><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gunites; <S%H1477><s%>
of Jezer, <S%H3337><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Jezerites; <S%H3340><s%> of Shillem, <S%H8006><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shillemites. <S%H8016><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families; <S%H4940><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were forty <S%H705><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

These are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> one <S%H505><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty. <S%H7970><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"To these the land <S%H776><s%> shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names. <S%H8034><s%>

To the more <S%H7235><s%> you shall give the more <S%H7235><s%> inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and to the fewer <S%H4592><s%> you shall give the less <S%H4591><s%> inheritance: <S%H5159><s%> to everyone <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of him shall his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> be given. <S%H5414><s%>

Notwithstanding, <S%H776><s%> the land shall be divided <S%H2505><s%> by lot: <S%H1486><s%> according to the names <S%H8034><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> they shall inherit. <S%H5157><s%>
According <S%H6310><s%> to the lot <S%H1486><s%> shall their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> be divided <S%H2505><s%> between the more <S%H7227><s%> and the fewer. <S%H4592><s%>"

These are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> after their families: <S%H4940><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites; <S%H1649><s%> of Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites; <S%H6956><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Merarites. <S%H4848><s%>

These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Levi: <S%H3881><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Libnites, <S%H3846><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hebronites, <S%H2276><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mahlites, <S%H4250><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mushites, <S%H4188><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Korahites. <S%H7145><s%> Kohath <S%H6955><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Amram. <S%H6019><s%>

The name <S%H8034><s%> of Amram <S%H6019><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> was Jochebed, <S%H3115><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> who was born <S%H3205><s%> to Levi <S%H3878><s%> in Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Amram <S%H6019><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and Miriam <S%H4813><s%> their sister. <S%H269><s%>
To Aaron <S%H175><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>
Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> when they offered <S%H7126><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were twenty <S%H6242><s%> - three <S%H7969><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> every male <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward: <S%H4605><s%> for they were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> because there was no inheritance <S%H5159><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> them among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

These are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who numbered <S%H6485><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

But among these there was not a man <S%H376><s%> of them who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who numbered <S%H6485><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> of them, <S%H4191><s%> They shall surely die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> There was not left <S%H3498><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of them, <S%H3612><s%> except Caleb the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>
